sections.title: Worship & Adoration
sections.bibleVerse: God is Spirit, and those who worship Him must worship in spirit and truth.
text: True worship is a lifestyle of surrender, reverence, and love for God. Let every moment, word, and song be an offering of adoration to the King of kings.

sections.title: The Word
sections.bibleVerse: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
May the Word of God be your guide, your strength, and your joy. Stay rooted in Christ, and let His truth shape your every step.

sections.title: Blog
sections.text: Welcome to the Blog! Here you'll find faith-inspired blog posts, testimonies, and reflections from Brother Femi. Stay tuned for updates and new entries.

blogtitles.title: Midnight Encounter
blogtitles.short_details: A life-changing midnight encounter with God that deepened my walk with Christ and taught me the value of seeking Him in the stillness.

blogtitles.title: My Journey to Faith
blogtitles.short_details: A personal testimony of how I encountered Christ and the lessons learned along the way.

blogtitles.title: Lessons from the Valley
blogtitles.short_details: Reflections on spiritual growth during difficult seasons and how God uses challenges for our good.

blogtitles.title: Worship as a Lifestyle
blogtitles.short_details: Exploring what it means to worship God in spirit and truth every day, not just in song.

sections.title: Hymns
sections.bibleVerse: Sing to the Lord, all the earth; proclaim the good news of His salvation from day to day.
